keyword: how many calories in one crumbl cookie
title: How Many Calories in One Crumbl Cookie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in one Crumbl cookie, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and tips for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in One Crumbl Cookie?
assumptions: Standard Crumbl cookie (approx. 120g), chocolate chip flavor, as sold in stores; values averaged across common recipes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, weekly recipe changes, size, and baking method. Check Crumbl's site or packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One Crumbl cookie typically contains about 710 kcal, with high sugar and fat content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream

faqs.q: How many calories in one Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: Approximately 710 kcal for a standard chocolate chip Crumbl cookie.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: About 90g carbs, 35g fat, 6g protein, and 60g sugars per cookie.

faqs.q: Do Crumbl cookies vary in calories by flavor?
faqs.a: Yes, flavors like salted caramel may add 50-100 kcal due to extra toppings or frosting.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: Around 60g of sugars, mostly from frosting and dough.

faqs.q: Are Crumbl cookies high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 400mg per cookie from ingredients like butter and salt.
